page.title: 07Amenities:1959_1985
page.content:
{Schools }
In 1959 there were 3 schools Corsica Hall College,Annecy R.C.School and Seaford Head School. {Corsica Hall College}is sited in College Road.It has remained upto 1985 but it is now a school for Domestic Science Teachers. {Annecy R.C.School}is sited in Sutton Avenue.It remains to this day. {Seaford Head School}however has changed.The Upper School building, which can be found in Arundel Road has not altered.However more recently a Middle School block has been built in Steyne Road. Religion in our area is mainly centred on the{Methodist Church.}The church is sited in Steyne Road and was there in 1959.
